column1: Pervinca was the third child and youngest daughter of [[Thain]] [[Paladin Took II]] and [[Eglantine Banks]], and elder sister to [[Peregrin Took]].

column2: 3001}} she was a guest at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref>{{App

column1: [http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/pervinca Pervinca] refers to periwinkle, trailing or erect evergreen plants such as the European creeper.<ref>{{HM
